3/18/22 CARDINAL , 12:53 AM TIME 3M Moderna vaccines from US Government ORG arrive from COVAX Facility Western Pacific Philippines ORG © 3M Moderna vaccines from US Government ORG arrive from COVAX Facility 3 August 2021 ORG Joint News Release | Philippine NORP President Rodrigo Duterte PERSON welcomed the arrival of 3 million CARDINAL doses of the Moderna GPE COVID- 19 CARDINAL vaccines from the US Government ORG through the COVAX Facility ORG , as the country braces for a hard lockdown in the capital Manila GPE to stem the spread of the Delta LOC variant of COVID-19 ORG .
The most recent arrival brings the total of COVAX donations to the Philippines GPE to 13.2 million CARDINAL doses of COVID-19 vaccines.

Of these, 6 million CARDINAL doses were donated by the US Government ORG as part of its global vaccine-sharing strategy, which aims to provide at least 80 million CARDINAL vaccine doses to countries most affected by the COVID-19 pandemic.

“We are thankful to the COVAX Facility ORG and our partners from the US Government ORG for these additional COVID-19 vaccines.

As we implement a stricter quarantine classification in Metro Manila GPE , we will continue to ramp up our national vaccination program and aim to increase coverage among our senior citizens and persons with underlying medical conditions.

Vaccinating those in the high-risk group would help prevent the overwhelming of our hospitals,” said Secretary of Health Francisco T. Duque III ORG .

The Philippine Government ORG has ramped up its vaccination campaign, reaching more than 500,000 CARDINAL inoculations daily DATE .

Since March 2021 DATE , over 84 percent PERCENT of healthcare workers ( A1 PRODUCT group), 32 percent PERCENT of senior citizens ( A2 NORP group), and 48 percent PERCENT of people with comorbidities* are fully vaccinated.

However, less than 5 percent PERCENT of essential workers ( A4 NORP group) and 2 percent PERCENT of the indigent population ( A5 ORG group) have been fully inoculated.

https://www.who.int/philippines/news/detail/03-08-2021-3m-moderna-vaccines-from-us-government-arrive-from-covax-facility 1/4 CARDINAL 3/18/22 PRODUCT , 12:53 AM TIME 3M Moderna vaccines from US Government ORG arrive from COVAX Facility The Department of Health ORG announced its accelerated vaccination plan during the hard lockdown, which includes strict scheduling/pre-registration, alternative modes of transportation for vaccinees, and special lanes for A2 PRODUCT and A3 PRODUCT population.
The COVAX Facility — co-led by Gavi PERSON , the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations ORG (CEPI) and the World Health Organization ORG (WHO), together with UNICEF — aims to provide access to quality-assured COVID-19 vaccines, enabling the protection of frontline health care and social workers, as well as other high-risk and vulnerable groups such as the elderly and those with underlying medical conditions.

“The WHO ORG commends the US GPE government for its efforts to share COVID-19 vaccines and facilitate their equitable distribution around the world.

We especially express our appreciation to the US GPE for sharing vaccines with the Philippines GPE .

Equitable global distribution of safe and effective vaccines is the only way to defeat the COVID-19 pandemic and we encourage other countries to also support COVAX through the sharing of vaccines,” said Dr Rabindra Abeyasinghe PERSON , WHO Representative to the Philippines GPE .

Each step we make is not only a step towards making sure everyone is safe, it also brings children closer to enjoying their full rights as children,” said Oyunsaikhan Dendevnorov PERSON , UNICEF Philippines Country Representative ORG .

DOH, WHO ORG , and UNICEF ORG continue to urge local governments to make the best use of available vaccines for the priority populations, while continuing with other preventive measures – wearing of masks, hand hygiene, physical distancing.

*Data does not include NCR ORG DOH: facebook.com/DOHhealthypilipinas WHO: facebook.com/whophilippines UNICEF: facebook.com/unicefphilippines https://www.who.int/philippines/news/detail/03-08-2021-3m-moderna-vaccines-from-us-government-arrive-from-covax-facility 2/4 CARDINAL 3/18/22 PRODUCT , 12:53 AM TIME 3M Moderna vaccines from US Government ORG arrive from COVAX Facility About COVAX COVAX ORG , the vaccines pillar of the Access PRODUCT to COVID-19 Tools (ACT) Accelerator, is co-led by the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI ORG ), Gavi PERSON , the Vaccine Alliance ORG , and the World Health Organization ORG (WHO) – working in partnership with UNICEF as key implementing partner, as well as civil society organizations, vaccine manufacturers, the World Bank ORG , and others.
